name: slime game (sadkirbo)
description:
the first game i've made with pygame, made in around 24 hours. it's very basic but it was a fun experiment, and i hope you enjoy!

how to play:

  • use the arrow keys or WASD to change the direction of gravity
  • you will fall in the direction of gravity, increasing in speed
  • hit the platforms to bounce off and earn points based on your speed
  • you will accelerate faster and the speed cap will increase the further you get
